meta.name: rcc_histology_plip_v2
meta.global_instructions: Text prompts are short English descriptions of high-power H&E renal tumor patches. Each concept should be visually recognizable on a 224x224 tile. Prompts are designed for PLIP (CLIP-like). This file keeps the original 32 concepts unchanged and extends them with extra concepts and prompt variants as multiple prompts per concept (no duplicate/alias concepts).

concepts.name: Diffuse clear cytoplasm
concepts.prompt: A high power H&E image of clear cell renal cell carcinoma with tumor cells showing diffusely clear, optically empty cytoplasm and small round nuclei.
prompts: A high power H&E image of clear cell renal cell carcinoma with tumor cells showing diffusely clear, optically empty cytoplasm and small round nuclei.
High power H&E of clear cell RCC: sheets of tumor cells with optically empty, lipid-like clear cytoplasm and delicate cell membranes.

concepts.name: Clear cells with delicate capillaries
concepts.prompt: A renal tumor H&E patch of clear cell renal cell carcinoma with nests of clear cells separated by a fine, delicate chicken-wire capillary network.
prompts: A renal tumor H&E patch of clear cell renal cell carcinoma with nests of clear cells separated by a fine, delicate chicken-wire capillary network.
H&E renal tumor patch: clear cell RCC nests traversed by a fine branching capillary network, like chicken-wire vasculature.

concepts.name: Alveolar or nested architecture
concepts.prompt: An H&E image of clear cell renal cell carcinoma showing discrete alveolar or nested groups of tumor cells surrounded by thin capillaries and small clear spaces between nests.
prompts: An H&E image of clear cell renal cell carcinoma showing discrete alveolar or nested groups of tumor cells surrounded by thin capillaries and small clear spaces between nests.
H&E renal tumor: clear cell RCC with rounded nests separated by capillary-rich septa, giving an alveolar nesting pattern.

concepts.name: Mixed clear and eosinophilic cytoplasm
concepts.prompt: A renal cell carcinoma H&E patch where most tumor cells have clear cytoplasm but a substantial subset shows more eosinophilic, granular cytoplasm within the same nests.
prompts: A renal cell carcinoma H&E patch where most tumor cells have clear cytoplasm but a substantial subset shows more eosinophilic, granular cytoplasm within the same nests.

concepts.name: Solid clear cell sheets
concepts.prompt: A high power H&E image of clear cell renal cell carcinoma with broad solid sheets of clear tumor cells and only sparse or inconspicuous capillaries.
prompts: A high power H&E image of clear cell renal cell carcinoma with broad solid sheets of clear tumor cells and only sparse or inconspicuous capillaries.

concepts.name: Microcystic clear cell pattern
concepts.prompt: A renal tumor H&E patch showing clear cell renal cell carcinoma with numerous small microcystic or vacuolated spaces between clear tumor cells.
prompts: A renal tumor H&E patch showing clear cell renal cell carcinoma with numerous small microcystic or vacuolated spaces between clear tumor cells.

concepts.name: Papillary fronds with fibrovascular cores
concepts.prompt: A high power H&E image of papillary renal cell carcinoma with multiple papillary fronds, each containing a fibrovascular core lined by tumor epithelium.
prompts: A high power H&E image of papillary renal cell carcinoma with multiple papillary fronds, each containing a fibrovascular core lined by tumor epithelium.
H&E of papillary RCC showing true papillae with fibrovascular cores, lined by neoplastic epithelium in multiple finger-like projections.

concepts.name: Type 1 papillary cytology
concepts.prompt: An H&E patch of papillary renal cell carcinoma type 1 with slender papillae lined by small cuboidal cells, scant pale cytoplasm and low-grade, basophilic nuclei.
prompts: An H&E patch of papillary renal cell carcinoma type 1 with slender papillae lined by small cuboidal cells, scant pale cytoplasm and low-grade, basophilic nuclei.
H&E papillary RCC type 1: low-grade nuclei, small cuboidal cells, pale cytoplasm, papillae that look slender and delicate.

concepts.name: Type 2 papillary cytology
concepts.prompt: An H&E patch of papillary renal cell carcinoma type 2 with papillae lined by larger eosinophilic tumor cells, higher nuclear grade and more prominent nucleoli.
prompts: An H&E patch of papillary renal cell carcinoma type 2 with papillae lined by larger eosinophilic tumor cells, higher nuclear grade and more prominent nucleoli.
H&E papillary RCC type 2: larger eosinophilic cells, higher nuclear grade, prominent nucleoli along papillary surfaces.

concepts.name: Foamy macrophages in papillary cores
concepts.prompt: A papillary renal cell carcinoma H&E image where numerous foamy macrophages with vacuolated cytoplasm aggregate within papillary fibrovascular cores or luminal spaces.
prompts: A papillary renal cell carcinoma H&E image where numerous foamy macrophages with vacuolated cytoplasm aggregate within papillary fibrovascular cores or luminal spaces.

concepts.name: Psammoma bodies
concepts.prompt: A renal tumor H&E patch showing papillary structures with multiple small, round, concentrically laminated psammoma bodies scattered in papillae or stroma.
prompts: A renal tumor H&E patch showing papillary structures with multiple small, round, concentrically laminated psammoma bodies scattered in papillae or stroma.

concepts.name: Tubulopapillary architecture
concepts.prompt: An H&E image of papillary renal cell carcinoma with complex short papillae and fused tubulopapillary structures rather than long, delicate papillary fronds.
prompts: An H&E image of papillary renal cell carcinoma with complex short papillae and fused tubulopapillary structures rather than long, delicate papillary fronds.

concepts.name: Hobnail nuclei along papillary lumens
concepts.prompt: A papillary renal cell carcinoma H&E patch where tumor nuclei protrude into the papillary lumen, creating a hobnail or pseudostratified appearance along the luminal surface.
prompts: A papillary renal cell carcinoma H&E patch where tumor nuclei protrude into the papillary lumen, creating a hobnail or pseudostratified appearance along the luminal surface.

concepts.name: Plant-cell borders
concepts.prompt: A chromophobe renal cell carcinoma H&E image showing polygonal tumor cells arranged in a mosaic with thick, sharply outlined plant-cell borders between adjacent cells.
prompts: A chromophobe renal cell carcinoma H&E image showing polygonal tumor cells arranged in a mosaic with thick, sharply outlined plant-cell borders between adjacent cells.
H&E chromophobe RCC: mosaic of polygonal cells with thick, sharply outlined cell borders creating a plant-cell appearance.

concepts.name: Perinuclear halos
concepts.prompt: A chromophobe renal cell carcinoma H&E patch with many tumor cells showing a clear perinuclear halo and more eosinophilic cytoplasm toward the cell periphery.
prompts: A chromophobe renal cell carcinoma H&E patch with many tumor cells showing a clear perinuclear halo and more eosinophilic cytoplasm toward the cell periphery.
H&E chromophobe RCC: polygonal eosinophilic cells with conspicuous perinuclear clearing (halos) and crisp cytoplasmic borders.

concepts.name: Pale reticulated cytoplasm
concepts.prompt: An H&E image of chromophobe renal cell carcinoma where tumor cells have pale, finely reticulated eosinophilic cytoplasm, sometimes with subtle vesicular or cobweb-like texture.
prompts: An H&E image of chromophobe renal cell carcinoma where tumor cells have pale, finely reticulated eosinophilic cytoplasm, sometimes with subtle vesicular or cobweb-like texture.

concepts.name: Raisinoid wrinkled nuclei
concepts.prompt: A chromophobe renal cell carcinoma H&E patch dominated by tumor cells with irregular, wrinkled raisinoid nuclei and relatively dense chromatin.
prompts: A chromophobe renal cell carcinoma H&E patch dominated by tumor cells with irregular, wrinkled raisinoid nuclei and relatively dense chromatin.

concepts.name: Oncocytic chromophobe variant
concepts.prompt: An H&E image of chromophobe renal cell carcinoma with more dense eosinophilic cytoplasm but still showing perinuclear halos or plant-cell borders in many cells.
prompts: An H&E image of chromophobe renal cell carcinoma with more dense eosinophilic cytoplasm but still showing perinuclear halos or plant-cell borders in many cells.

concepts.name: Compact oncocytic cytoplasm
concepts.prompt: A renal oncocytoma H&E patch with sheets of tumor cells having abundant, dense, finely granular, intensely eosinophilic oncocytic cytoplasm and relatively uniform round nuclei.
prompts: A renal oncocytoma H&E patch with sheets of tumor cells having abundant, dense, finely granular, intensely eosinophilic oncocytic cytoplasm and relatively uniform round nuclei.
H&E oncocytoma: uniform tumor cells with dense granular eosinophilic cytoplasm (oncocytic), bland round nuclei, minimal pleomorphism.

concepts.name: Archipelagenous oncocytoma islands
concepts.prompt: An H&E image of renal oncocytoma showing round or oval islands of oncocytic tumor cells separated by pale, loose or myxoid stroma giving an archipelagenous pattern.
prompts: An H&E image of renal oncocytoma showing round or oval islands of oncocytic tumor cells separated by pale, loose or myxoid stroma giving an archipelagenous pattern.
H&E renal oncocytoma: round islands of oncocytic cells separated by pale edematous or myxoid stroma, an archipelago pattern.

concepts.name: Central fibrous scar
concepts.prompt: A renal oncocytoma H&E patch containing dense central fibrous tissue with entrapped thick-walled vessels and surrounding nodules of oncocytic tumor cells.
prompts: A renal oncocytoma H&E patch containing dense central fibrous tissue with entrapped thick-walled vessels and surrounding nodules of oncocytic tumor cells.

concepts.name: Thick-walled vessels in oncocytoma
concepts.prompt: An H&E image of renal oncocytoma highlighting thick-walled hyalinized vessels running between nests of oncocytic tumor cells in loose stroma.
prompts: An H&E image of renal oncocytoma highlighting thick-walled hyalinized vessels running between nests of oncocytic tumor cells in loose stroma.

concepts.name: Low-grade nuclei (ISUP 1–2)
concepts.prompt: A high power H&E patch of renal cell carcinoma with mostly small, uniform nuclei and inconspicuous or small nucleoli, consistent with low ISUP grade 1 or 2.
prompts: A high power H&E patch of renal cell carcinoma with mostly small, uniform nuclei and inconspicuous or small nucleoli, consistent with low ISUP grade 1 or 2.

concepts.name: High-grade nuclei (ISUP 3–4)
concepts.prompt: A renal cell carcinoma H&E patch with enlarged pleomorphic nuclei and prominent nucleoli easily visible at low power, compatible with high ISUP grade 3 or 4.
prompts: A renal cell carcinoma H&E patch with enlarged pleomorphic nuclei and prominent nucleoli easily visible at low power, compatible with high ISUP grade 3 or 4.

concepts.name: Coagulative tumor necrosis
concepts.prompt: An H&E image of renal cell carcinoma showing a sharp transition from viable tumor to areas of coagulative necrosis with eosinophilic ghost cells and granular debris.
prompts: An H&E image of renal cell carcinoma showing a sharp transition from viable tumor to areas of coagulative necrosis with eosinophilic ghost cells and granular debris.

concepts.name: Sarcomatoid spindle-cell areas
concepts.prompt: A renal cell carcinoma H&E patch containing malignant spindle-cell fascicles with high nuclear atypia and loss of epithelial architecture, representing sarcomatoid transformation.
prompts: A renal cell carcinoma H&E patch containing malignant spindle-cell fascicles with high nuclear atypia and loss of epithelial architecture, representing sarcomatoid transformation.

concepts.name: Rhabdoid tumor cells
concepts.prompt: An H&E image of renal cell carcinoma with scattered large rhabdoid cells having eccentric nuclei, prominent nucleoli and dense eosinophilic cytoplasmic inclusions.
prompts: An H&E image of renal cell carcinoma with scattered large rhabdoid cells having eccentric nuclei, prominent nucleoli and dense eosinophilic cytoplasmic inclusions.

concepts.name: Tumor-associated hemorrhage
concepts.prompt: A renal tumor H&E patch showing extensive fresh or organizing hemorrhage within and around nests of carcinoma cells.
prompts: A renal tumor H&E patch showing extensive fresh or organizing hemorrhage within and around nests of carcinoma cells.

concepts.name: Lymphocytic inflammatory infiltrate
concepts.prompt: An H&E image of renal cell carcinoma with a dense lymphocytic infiltrate in the tumor stroma or at the interface between tumor and surrounding kidney.
prompts: An H&E image of renal cell carcinoma with a dense lymphocytic infiltrate in the tumor stroma or at the interface between tumor and surrounding kidney.

concepts.name: Thick fibrous septa
concepts.prompt: A renal tumor H&E patch where nests or sheets of carcinoma cells are separated by broad, collagen-rich fibrous septa.
prompts: A renal tumor H&E patch where nests or sheets of carcinoma cells are separated by broad, collagen-rich fibrous septa.

concepts.name: Cystic or tubular spaces with eosinophilic fluid
concepts.prompt: An H&E image of renal cell carcinoma containing cystic or tubular spaces lined by tumor cells and filled with eosinophilic or proteinaceous luminal material.
prompts: An H&E image of renal cell carcinoma containing cystic or tubular spaces lined by tumor cells and filled with eosinophilic or proteinaceous luminal material.

concepts.name: Peritumoral normal kidney tissue
concepts.prompt: An H&E patch showing the interface between renal cell carcinoma and adjacent non-neoplastic kidney parenchyma with preserved tubules and glomeruli.
prompts: An H&E patch showing the interface between renal cell carcinoma and adjacent non-neoplastic kidney parenchyma with preserved tubules and glomeruli.

concepts.name: Tubular or acinar clear cell pattern
concepts.prompt: H&E clear cell RCC showing tubular or acinar structures lined by clear cells, with small lumina and delicate intervening capillaries.
prompts: H&E clear cell RCC showing tubular or acinar structures lined by clear cells, with small lumina and delicate intervening capillaries.

concepts.name: Macrocystic change in clear cell RCC
concepts.prompt: H&E clear cell RCC with large cystic spaces or pseudocysts, lined by clear tumor cells and thin septa with small vessels.
prompts: H&E clear cell RCC with large cystic spaces or pseudocysts, lined by clear tumor cells and thin septa with small vessels.

concepts.name: Hemosiderin-laden macrophages in papillary RCC
concepts.prompt: H&E papillary RCC with coarse golden-brown hemosiderin pigment in macrophages within papillary cores or adjacent hemorrhagic stroma.
prompts: H&E papillary RCC with coarse golden-brown hemosiderin pigment in macrophages within papillary cores or adjacent hemorrhagic stroma.

concepts.name: Hyalinized or sclerotic papillary cores
concepts.prompt: H&E papillary RCC showing papillae with sclerotic or hyalinized fibrovascular cores, sometimes thick and glassy beneath epithelium.
prompts: H&E papillary RCC showing papillae with sclerotic or hyalinized fibrovascular cores, sometimes thick and glassy beneath epithelium.

concepts.name: Papillary RCC with crowded pseudostratified lining
concepts.prompt: H&E papillary RCC with crowded epithelial lining and nuclear pseudostratification along papillary surfaces, with true fibrovascular cores.
prompts: H&E papillary RCC with crowded epithelial lining and nuclear pseudostratification along papillary surfaces, with true fibrovascular cores.

concepts.name: Chromophobe RCC solid sheets with pale eosinophilic cells
concepts.prompt: H&E chromophobe RCC showing broad solid sheets of pale eosinophilic polygonal cells with distinct cell borders and low mitotic activity.
prompts: H&E chromophobe RCC showing broad solid sheets of pale eosinophilic polygonal cells with distinct cell borders and low mitotic activity.

concepts.name: Chromophobe RCC binucleated tumor cells
concepts.prompt: H&E chromophobe RCC with frequent binucleated cells, raisinoid nuclear irregularity, and sharply outlined cell membranes.
prompts: H&E chromophobe RCC with frequent binucleated cells, raisinoid nuclear irregularity, and sharply outlined cell membranes.

concepts.name: Chromophobe RCC cytoplasmic microvesicles / reticular clearing
concepts.prompt: H&E chromophobe RCC: tumor cells with pale, microvesicular or reticulated cytoplasm and perinuclear clearing, giving a finely vacuolated look.
prompts: H&E chromophobe RCC: tumor cells with pale, microvesicular or reticulated cytoplasm and perinuclear clearing, giving a finely vacuolated look.

concepts.name: Oncocytoma nested / trabecular architecture
concepts.prompt: H&E renal oncocytoma showing nests and trabeculae of oncocytic cells separated by delicate stroma, without prominent perinuclear halos.
prompts: H&E renal oncocytoma showing nests and trabeculae of oncocytic cells separated by delicate stroma, without prominent perinuclear halos.

concepts.name: Oncocytoma tubulocystic pattern
concepts.prompt: H&E oncocytoma with small tubules or cystic spaces lined by oncocytic cells, with granular eosinophilic cytoplasm and bland nuclei.
prompts: H&E oncocytoma with small tubules or cystic spaces lined by oncocytic cells, with granular eosinophilic cytoplasm and bland nuclei.
H&E oncocytoma showing a tubulocystic pattern with variably sized cysts and small tubules lined by oncocytic cells.

concepts.name: Oncocytoma edematous / myxoid stroma
concepts.prompt: H&E renal oncocytoma with pale edematous or myxoid stroma separating nests of oncocytic cells, producing a loose stromal background.
prompts: H&E renal oncocytoma with pale edematous or myxoid stroma separating nests of oncocytic cells, producing a loose stromal background.

concepts.name: Oncocytoma bland round nuclei
concepts.prompt: H&E oncocytoma: uniform round nuclei with minimal pleomorphism in oncocytic cells, lacking raisinoid wrinkling or strong perinuclear halos.
prompts: H&E oncocytoma: uniform round nuclei with minimal pleomorphism in oncocytic cells, lacking raisinoid wrinkling or strong perinuclear halos.

concepts.name: Normal renal glomerulus and Bowman space
concepts.prompt: H&E normal kidney cortex showing a glomerular tuft with Bowman space and surrounding tubules, no atypical tumor nests.
prompts: H&E normal kidney cortex showing a glomerular tuft with Bowman space and surrounding tubules, no atypical tumor nests.

concepts.name: Proximal tubules with brush border
concepts.prompt: H&E normal kidney with proximal convoluted tubules: eosinophilic cytoplasm and fuzzy luminal brush borders, orderly tubular profiles.
prompts: H&E normal kidney with proximal convoluted tubules: eosinophilic cytoplasm and fuzzy luminal brush borders, orderly tubular profiles.

concepts.name: Distal tubules / collecting ducts
concepts.prompt: H&E normal kidney with distal tubules or collecting ducts: paler cuboidal cells, cleaner lumina, and regular tubular arrangement.
prompts: H&E normal kidney with distal tubules or collecting ducts: paler cuboidal cells, cleaner lumina, and regular tubular arrangement.

concepts.name: Renal medulla with collecting ducts and vasa recta
concepts.prompt: H&E renal medulla showing parallel collecting ducts and thin vascular channels (vasa recta), lacking tumor cell nests or papillary fronds.
prompts: H&E renal medulla showing parallel collecting ducts and thin vascular channels (vasa recta), lacking tumor cell nests or papillary fronds.

concepts.name: Arteriole / small artery in kidney parenchyma
concepts.prompt: H&E kidney parenchyma containing a small artery or arteriole with a muscular wall and endothelial-lined lumen, adjacent normal tubules.
prompts: H&E kidney parenchyma containing a small artery or arteriole with a muscular wall and endothelial-lined lumen, adjacent normal tubules.

concepts.name: Chronic interstitial fibrosis with tubular atrophy
concepts.prompt: H&E non-neoplastic kidney showing interstitial fibrosis and atrophic tubules, with preserved overall architecture and no malignant nests.
prompts: H&E non-neoplastic kidney showing interstitial fibrosis and atrophic tubules, with preserved overall architecture and no malignant nests.

concepts.name: Perirenal adipose tissue
concepts.prompt: H&E showing mature adipose tissue with large clear fat vacuoles and thin septa, without clusters of atypical carcinoma cells.
prompts: H&E showing mature adipose tissue with large clear fat vacuoles and thin septa, without clusters of atypical carcinoma cells.

concepts.name: Urothelium / renal pelvis-type lining (if present)
concepts.prompt: H&E showing urothelial-type lining epithelium with multiple cell layers and a smooth surface, without papillary RCC tumor fronds.
prompts: H&E showing urothelial-type lining epithelium with multiple cell layers and a smooth surface, without papillary RCC tumor fronds.

concepts.name: Neutrophil-rich acute inflammation
concepts.prompt: H&E patch with abundant neutrophils and acute inflammatory exudate in stroma or lumina, not a specific RCC subtype feature.
prompts: H&E patch with abundant neutrophils and acute inflammatory exudate in stroma or lumina, not a specific RCC subtype feature.

concepts.name: Fibrovascular scar-like stroma (non-specific)
concepts.prompt: H&E image with dense collagenized scar-like stroma and few cells, separating adjacent tissue elements; non-specific across diagnoses.
prompts: H&E image with dense collagenized scar-like stroma and few cells, separating adjacent tissue elements; non-specific across diagnoses.

concepts.name: Hyalinized thick basement membranes (non-specific)
concepts.prompt: H&E patch showing thick, hyalinized basement membrane-like material around tubules or small structures, not defining a subtype by itself.
prompts: H&E patch showing thick, hyalinized basement membrane-like material around tubules or small structures, not defining a subtype by itself.

concepts.name: Organoid packed nests (oncocytoma)
concepts.prompt: H&E renal oncocytoma with an organoid growth pattern of tightly packed nests of oncocytic cells and thin intervening stroma.
prompts: H&E renal oncocytoma with an organoid growth pattern of tightly packed nests of oncocytic cells and thin intervening stroma.

concepts.name: Packed nests with small capillaries (oncocytoma)
concepts.prompt: H&E oncocytoma showing tight nests of oncocytic cells with many small capillaries in the stroma between nests.
prompts: H&E oncocytoma showing tight nests of oncocytic cells with many small capillaries in the stroma between nests.

concepts.name: Less dense nests in edematous stroma (oncocytoma)
concepts.prompt: H&E renal oncocytoma with oncocytic nests that are less densely arranged within abundant pale edematous or myxoid stroma.
prompts: H&E renal oncocytoma with oncocytic nests that are less densely arranged within abundant pale edematous or myxoid stroma.

concepts.name: Peripheral rim around edematous stroma (oncocytoma)
concepts.prompt: H&E oncocytoma with a peripheral rim of oncocytic tumor cells surrounding abundant pale edematous stromal tissue.
prompts: H&E oncocytoma with a peripheral rim of oncocytic tumor cells surrounding abundant pale edematous stromal tissue.

concepts.name: Polygonal oncocytic cells with prominent nucleoli
concepts.prompt: H&E oncocytoma with large polygonal cells, dense granular eosinophilic cytoplasm, round nuclei, and conspicuous nucleoli.
prompts: H&E oncocytoma with large polygonal cells, dense granular eosinophilic cytoplasm, round nuclei, and conspicuous nucleoli.

concepts.name: Cystic oncocytoma pattern
concepts.prompt: H&E renal oncocytoma with cystic spaces and oncocytic tumor cells forming cystic structures separated by thin septa.
prompts: H&E renal oncocytoma with cystic spaces and oncocytic tumor cells forming cystic structures separated by thin septa.

concepts.name: Oncocytoma nests with round nuclei and no halos
concepts.prompt: H&E renal oncocytoma with nests of oncocytic cells, predominantly round nuclei, and no obvious perinuclear halos.
prompts: H&E renal oncocytoma with nests of oncocytic cells, predominantly round nuclei, and no obvious perinuclear halos.

concepts.name: Oncocytoma with uncommon binucleation and no zonal necrosis
concepts.prompt: H&E oncocytoma with nests of oncocytic cells, binucleation uncommon, and no zonal coagulative necrosis.
prompts: H&E oncocytoma with nests of oncocytic cells, binucleation uncommon, and no zonal coagulative necrosis.

concepts.name: Moderately circumscribed oncocytoma nests
concepts.prompt: H&E renal oncocytoma showing a moderately circumscribed tumor composed of oncocytic nests in a clean stromal background.
prompts: H&E renal oncocytoma showing a moderately circumscribed tumor composed of oncocytic nests in a clean stromal background.
